note.p: Birth: Vrommen-hofen, East Flanders, (At time of birth a province of Austria) (26 December 1776)
Death: 40 Park Street, Plymouth, Devon (21 September 1859)
Burial: In the family vault at Pennycross
Career: Entered Army; Major (by 1824); Lieutenant Colonel (by 1835)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1859-1860 vol 10 pp xxiv-xxvi
